headers.subject: [tosdr:730] Microsoft Bizspark - Use of Participant's trademarks and services marks without needing permission
headers.x-original-authentication-results: ls.google.com; spf=pass (google.com: domain of julian.debhal@gmail.com designates internal as permitted sender) smtp.mail=julian.debhal@gmail.com; dkim=pass header.i=@gmail.com

html:
3.4 and 3.4(b) (i) Startup grants to Microsoft a nonexclusive, nontransferable, limited license to use Startup’s trademarks and services marks, trade dress, trade names, designs, slogans, domain names, logos, and other business identifiers (collectively, “Startup Marks”) that Startup provides to Microsoft as part of the Program registration. ii. In addition to the license to Startup Marks above in Section 3.4(b)(i), Startup grants to Microsoft the right to publish, use, reference, and display Startup’s name and other information, including but not limited to quotes, names, or pictures of, related to, and about Startup. iii. Startup will obtain sufficient permissions from its employees and/or contractors whose quotes, names, pictures, and/or other materials Microsoft may use pursuant to this Section

So Microsoft can use your name and trademarks without asking.  They need permissions like this to promote you, but the lack of asking is a bit questionable.

--
www.tos-dr.info // www.twitter.com/tosdr // www.github.com/Unhosted/ToS-DR
---

subject: Microsoft Bizspark - Use of Participant's trademarks and services marks without needing permission
text:
3.4 and 3.4(b) (i) Startup grants to Microsoft a nonexclusive, 
nontransferable, limited license to use Startup’s trademarks and services 
marks, trade dress, trade names, designs, slogans, domain names, logos, and 
other business identifiers (collectively, “Startup Marks”) that Startup 
provides to Microsoft as part of the Program registration. ii. In addition 
to the license to Startup Marks above in Section 3.4(b)(i), Startup grants 
to Microsoft the right to publish, use, reference, and display Startup’s 
name and other information, including but not limited to quotes, names, or 
pictures of, related to, and about Startup. iii. Startup will obtain 
sufficient permissions from its employees and/or contractors whose quotes, 
names, pictures, and/or other materials Microsoft may use pursuant to this 
Section

So Microsoft can use your name and trademarks without asking.  They need 
permissions like this to promote you, but the lack of asking is a bit 
questionable.

--
